GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
x86/unwind/orc: Fix unreliable stack dump with gcov

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 671f399008a2138058536808ca54fd222d6c4b46, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit f1d9a2abff66aa8156fbc1493abed468db63ea48. For more details please see the references link.
